000421.SZ.long_name: Nanjing Public Utilities Development Co., Ltd.
000421.SZ.summary: Nanjing Public Utilities Development Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the passenger transportation business in China. The company owns approximately 2,363 taxi vehicles. It offers passenger taxi, electric taxi, highway passenger transportation, and tourist-chartered passenger transportation services; and operates gas pipelines. The company also engages in the sale of automobiles; car purchasing, licensing, repair, insurance, display, entertainment, maintenance, and parts supply activities; construction, real estate development, commercial housing sale, and leasing activities; and power generation business. In addition, it engages in outbound tourism, inbound tourism, domestic tourism, airline ticketing, business travel exhibition, and e-commerce businesses. Further, the company provides small loans and financial services for agriculture, rural areas, small and medium-sized enterprises, and self-employed individuals; and driving school training, and other services. The company was formerly known as Nanjing Zhongbei (Group) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Nanjing Public Utilities Development Co., Ltd. in June 2016. Nanjing Public Utilities Development Co., Ltd. is based in Nanjing, China.

000557.SZ.summary: Ningxia Ningdong Railway Co., Ltd. offers railway construction services. It offers railway development, construction, and management, warehousing and logistics, electrical and vehicle maintenance, hotel management, hotel, accommodation, catering, and entertainment services. Ningxia Ningdong Railway Co., Ltd. is based in Yinchuan, China.

000920.SZ.summary: South Huiton Co., Ltd. manufactures reverse osmosis membrane elements in China. Its reverse osmosis membrane elements are used in desalting of seawater, brackish water, boiler water replenishment, wastewater treatment, germ-free drinking water, etc. The company also offers lithium cells for use in various portable mobile electronic equipment; and central air-conditioning energy saving software and water purifies. In addition, it manufactures, overhauls, and repairs railway wagons; spare parts for locomotives and rolling stocks; and researches, develops, and produces elastic palm fiber materials, etc. for use in home mattresses, cushions, hotels, hospitals, schools, passenger vehicles, etc. South Huiton Co., Ltd. is based in Guiyang, China.

000976.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Huatie Tongda High-speed Railway Equipment Corporation
000976.SZ.summary: Guangdong Huatie Tongda High-speed Railway Equipment Corporation researches, designs, develops, manufactures, sells, and services high-speed rail parts in the People's Republic of China. The company offers braking, fire alarm, backup power, air conditioning, door, hook, and water supply sanitation systems; sanding devices; brakes and brake discs; and road maintenance machinery. It offers its products for the urban rail transit, locomotive field, railway wagon field, high-speed railway, and EMU field applications. The company was formerly known as Guangdong Kaiping Chunhui Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Huatie Tongda High-speed Railway Equipment Corporation in October 2017. Guangdong Huatie Tongda High-speed Railway Equipment Corporation was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

002296.SZ.long_name: HeNan Splendor Science & Technology Co., Ltd.
002296.SZ.summary: HeNan Splendor Science & Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, and promotes rail transit measurement and control technologies for the rail transit industry in China. The company's products and solutions for the national railways include railway signal centralized, hump signal centralized, railway track comprehensive, frequency shift track circuit outdoor, railway power environment, signal room UPS and battery online, railway communication tower, high-speed railway natural disaster and foreign body intrusion limit, wireless shunting locomotive signal, and railway integrated video monitoring systems. Its national railway products and solutions also comprise railway signal centralized monitoring handheld terminal systems; electric service integrated data analysis platform systems; electric heating channel snow melting system equipment; high-speed railway perimeter intrusion alarm systems; distributed self-discipline scheduling centralized systems; and train dispatching command, wireless shunting locomotive signal, electric dispatching command center, operation guarantee mobile terminal, computer interlocking, and axle counting systems. In addition, the company offers urban rail transit signal maintenance support, environment and equipment monitoring, urban rail transit integrated monitoring, urban rail transit automatic ticket inspection, CCTV monitoring, and automatic train monitoring systems for urban rail transit. Further, it provides special railway transportation command integrated systems for dedicated line railways, as well as pre- and after-sale services. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Zhengzhou, China.

002357.SZ.long_name: Sichuan Fulin Transportation Group Co., Ltd.
002357.SZ.summary: Sichuan Fulin Transportation Group Co., Ltd. engages in the road transportation business in China. The company provides passenger, travel, charter, car rental, maintenance, and ticket inquiry, as well as advertising services. It also offers station, taxi and urban bus operations, vehicle maintenance and inspection, driver training, insurance concurrent agency, and cross-border investment services. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Chengdu, China.

0525.HK.summary: Guangshen Railway Company Limited engages in the railway passenger and freight transportation business in the People's Republic of China. Its passenger transportation services include the operation of Guangzhou-Shenzhen inter-city express trains, long-distance trains, and Guangzhou-Hong Kong city through trains. The company's freight transportation services comprise the transportation of full load and single load cargos, containers, bulky and heavy cargo, dangerous goods, perishable goods, and oversized cargo. It also provides railway network usage services; and other transportation-related services, such as railway operation, locomotive and passenger car leasing, passenger service, and luggage transportation services, as well as sells food, beverages, and merchandise on board the trains and in railway stations. In addition, the company is involved in train repair, on-board catering, materials and supplies sale, goods sale, cargo loading and unloading, and other businesses related to railway transportation. Further, it offers warehousing, hotel management, and real estate construction services. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

1596.HK.long_name: Hebei Yichen Industrial Group Corporation Limited
1596.HK.summary: Hebei Yichen Industrial Group Corporation Limited provides rail fastening systems to the railway industry in the People's Republic of China. The company operates in three segments: Rail Fastening System Products, Flux Cored Wire Products, and Railway Sleeper Products. The company offers high speed rail fastening system, metro series, traditional track series, and heavy haul railway series products, as well as flux cored wire products to the shipbuilding industry. It primarily sells its flux cored wire products through direct sales and e-commerce platforms. The company also manufactures and sells welding materials. Hebei Yichen Industrial Group Corporation Limited was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shijiazhuang, the People's Republic of China.

1766.HK.summary: CRRC Corporation Limited and its subsidiaries research, design, develop, manufacture, sell, refurbish, service, and lease locomotives and rolling stock in Mainland China and internationally. The company provides rolling stock, which includes electric and diesel locomotives, trains, EMU, DMU, metro cars, LRVs, coaches, wagons, and track machinery; components, such as motors, electric control equipment, locomotive components, vehicle components, and casting and forging; and other products, consisting trucks, buses, construction machineries, turnouts, wind turbines, and intelligent machines. It also offers engineering machinery, mechanical equipment, electronic appliances, environmental protection equipment, technical services and equipment leasing of related products, related components, as well as information consultation, industry investment and management services; asset management; and import and export services. The company was formerly known as CSR Corporation Limited and changed its name to CRRC Corporation Limited in June 2015. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

2169.HK.summary: Canggang Railway Limited operates a railway in Hebei Province. The company provides rail freight transportation services through the Canggang Railway Line, which transports a range of cargo, primarily coal, as well as petroleum, ore, and other cargo, including PVC, asphalt, and gravel between Cangzhou and Port Huanghua. It also offers ancillary services comprising loading and unloading, as well as road freight transportation services. In addition, the company provides construction, maintenance, and repair services, primarily include the operation, repair, and maintenance of special service lines and railway roadbed and other railway facility construction. Further, it offers additional ancillary services, principally covering car arrival, freight agency, antifreeze treatment, and scattering prevention of coal services; and coal filtering services. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Cangzhou, China.

300407.SZ.summary: Tianjin Keyvia Electric Co.,Ltd provides electrified railway and urban rail transit equipment in China. The company offers traction power supply and distribution automation systems, dispatching and integrated monitoring systems, industrial automation systems, auxiliary control systems for rolling stocks, monitoring and diagnostic systems, video security monitoring systems, disaster prevention alarm systems, wireless communication systems, access control systems, automatic ticket checking systems, electromechanical equipment monitoring systems, and passenger information system systems, as well as disaster prevention systems, and others. It is also involved in the development, manufacture, sale, engineering, and installation and service of software products; computer and mechatronics systems integration; and import and export business, as well as provision of technical consulting services. The company is based in Tianjin, China.

300440.SZ.summary: Chengdu Yunda Technology Co., Ltd. focuses on the development, production, and sale of rail vehicle system testing and control equipment in China. The company offers train driving, station attendant, dispatcher training, and rail integrated simulators, as well as railway rescue crane simulation training systems; and distributed logic control and detecting units in locomotives, and intelligent display units for trains, TCN complete train control systems, locomotive safety and fire protection monitoring systems, monitoring devices for the running gear of locomotives, and brake logic control units. It also provides track management automation systems, automation safety work platforms, integrated classes, and works disaster prevention systems; and metro security platforms, track management automation systems, locomotive equipment management information systems, management information systems for locomotive maintenance, and integrated management systems for servicing operations. Chengdu Yunda Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Chengdu, China. The company is a subsidiary of Chengdu Yunda Innovative Technology Group Co., Ltd.

300587.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Tiantie Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and marketing of track engineering rubber products in China. It offers track structures, such as rails, sleepers, and ballast; vibration damping products; isolated rubber damping pads; embedded rubber crossing boards and plates; conveyor belts; elastic components; and sealing products and other rubber products. The company also provides elastic support type non- ball track with rubber boots; rubber spring vibrators; rail waveguide absorbers; rubber wheel rims and grooves; cushioning pads and pavement products; railway rubber gaskets; and elastic integral bumper plates. Its products are used in urban rail transit, high-speed railway, heavy haul railway, ordinary railway, intercity railway, light railway, subway, and other rail transportation lines. The company also exports its products to Russia, the United States, Vietnam, Germany, Hong Kong, and internationally. Zhejiang Tiantie Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Taizhou, China.

300789.SZ.summary: Chengdu Tangyuan Electric Co.,Ltd. operates as a rail transit operation and maintenance solution provider in China. It also develops, manufactures, and sells inspection and monitoring, and information management systems. The company's products include car contact network detection, car contact network HD imaging monitoring, contact network ground detection and monitoring, track and tunnel inspection and monitoring, diagnostic and evaluation, and management information systems. It offers traction power supply and public works engineering services for the rail transit industry. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Chengdu, China.

300851.SZ.long_name: Beijing Jiaoda Signal Technology Co., Ltd.
300851.SZ.summary: Beijing Jiaoda Signal Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells railway transportation security devices in China. The company offers balise transmission modules (BTM), track circuit readers, lineside electronic units, balise telegram programmers, transparent data loop, and transparent data and fixed data balise products; on-board cab signaling equipment, track circuit readers, cab signaling plugin boards for railcar, and digital general cab signaling equipment; and onboard cab signaling data recorders, BTM recorders, remote monitoring systems, and telegram encoding systems. Its products are used in railway, urban transit, and other projects. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, China.

300923.SZ.summary: Yeal Electric Co.,Ltd manufactures equipment for the railway sector. It offers driver control, electrical screen operation control, lighting control, under car control, power supply control, and electrical connection (harness) systems. The company was founded in 1971 and is based in Changchun, China.

3898.HK.long_name: Zhuzhou CRRC Times Electric Co., Ltd.
3898.HK.summary: Zhuzhou CRRC Times Electric Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, in the research, development, designs, manufactures, and sells railway transportation equipment products, and provision of relevant services primarily in Mainland China and internationally. The company also produces propulsion and control systems for trains and electric vehicles, signaling systems, power supply solutions, platform screen doors, rail maintenance vehicles, marine engineering equipment, and component products for various applications. Its products for rolling stock and railways include EMU, locomotive, and mass transit systems; and components products consist of semiconductors, resistors, reactors, radiators, sensors, power capacitors, and heatsinks. The company's energy and industrial products comprise marine engineering, electric vehicle, and inverter and converter systems, as well as provides railway maintenance and construction machines. The company was formerly known as Zhuzhou CSR Times Electric Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhuzhou CRRC Times Electric Co., Ltd. in March 2016. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong.

3969.HK.long_name: China Railway Signal & Communication Corporation Limited
3969.HK.summary: China Railway Signal & Communication Corporation Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides rail transportation control system solutions in China and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Rail Transportation Control System, General Construction Contracting, and Others. It offers design, consultancy, and system integration services for rail transportation control system projects; and integrated rail transportation solutions. The company also produces and sells signal system products, communication information system products, infrastructure equipment and information systems, and other related products. In addition, it offers construction, installation, testing, operation, and maintenance services for rail transportation control systems; and services relating to municipal engineering projects and other construction projects. Further, the company engages in the investment management, technical exchange and trade, and bidding agency activities, as well as provision of project management activities. The company was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Beijing, China. China Railway Signal & Communication Corporation Limited is a subsidiary of China Railway Signal & Communication (Group) Corporation Limited.

600125.SS.long_name: China Railway Tielong Container Logistics Co., Ltd
600125.SS.summary: China Railway Tielong Container Logistics Co., Ltd. provides railway transportation services in China. It offers railway special container logistics services, such as transportation of steel, grain, ore, cement, chilled and liquid chemicals, and other transportation services. The company is also involved in the provision of railway freight, port logistics, warehousing, and freight forwarding services, as well as real estate development activities. China Railway Tielong Container Logistics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Dalian, China.

600368.SS.summary: Guangxi Wuzhou Communications Co., Ltd. operates toll roads. It is also involved logistics and real estate businesses. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Nanning, China.

600495.SS.summary: Jinxi Axle Company Limited produces and sells railway vehicles, axles, wheels, bogies, and other products primarily in China. The company also offers car transport and shared flat cars, box cars, stone hopper cars, ZBTO tanker, light tankers, gondolas, and electric flatbeds, as well as hollow shaft anatomy, axle trailers, and power shafts. In addition, it engages in precision forging and non-standard manufacturing activities. Its axle products are used in various railway locomotives, trucks, buses, subways, and railway vehicles. The company also exports its products to the United States, Canada, Britain, France, Australia, Brazil, India, and other regions and countries. Jinxi Axle Company Limited is based in Taiyuan, China.

600561.SS.summary: Jiangxi Changyun Co., Ltd. provides passenger road transportation services in Jiangxi Province. The company constructs roads and passenger transport stations, as well as maintains operations; and provides travel, logistics, car rental, and property management services. It operates 77 passenger stations; 7,623 vehicles; and 2,106 operating lines. The company was founded in 1925 and is based in Nanchang, China.

600834.SS.summary: Shanghai Shentong Metro Co., Ltd. is engaged in the investment and operation of metro line in Shanghai, China. The company operates Shanghai No. 1 metro line. Shanghai Shentong Metro Co., Ltd. is based in Shanghai, China. Shanghai Shentong Metro Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Shanghai Shentong Metro Group Co., Ltd.

601006.SS.summary: Daqin Railway Co., Ltd. provides railway transportation services in the People's Republic of China. It transports coal, coke, and iron and steel ores. The company also offers railway passenger transportation services. It operates 15 passenger routes that cover passenger mileage of 2,187 kilometers, as well as 9 trunk lines. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Datong, the People's Republic of China.

601333.SS.summary: Guangshen Railway Company Limited engages in the railway passenger and freight transportation business in the People's Republic of China. Its passenger transportation services include the operation of Guangzhou-Shenzhen inter-city express trains, long-distance trains, and Guangzhou-Hong Kong city through trains. The company's freight transportation services comprise the transportation of full load and single load cargos, containers, bulky and heavy cargo, dangerous goods, perishable goods, and oversized cargo. It also provides railway network usage services; and other transportation-related services, such as railway operation, locomotive and passenger car leasing, passenger service, and luggage transportation services, as well as sells food, beverages, and merchandise on board the trains and in railway stations. In addition, the company is involved in train repair, on-board catering, materials and supplies sale, goods sale, cargo loading and unloading, and other businesses related to railway transportation. Further, it offers warehousing, hotel management, and real estate construction services. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

601766.SS.summary: CRRC Corporation Limited and its subsidiaries research, design, develop, manufacture, sell, refurbish, service, and lease locomotives and rolling stock in Mainland China and internationally. The company provides rolling stock, which includes electric and diesel locomotives, trains, EMU, DMU, metro cars, LRVs, coaches, wagons, and track machinery; components, such as motors, electric control equipment, locomotive components, vehicle components, and casting and forging; and other products, consisting trucks, buses, construction machineries, turnouts, wind turbines, and intelligent machines. It also offers engineering machinery, mechanical equipment, electronic appliances, environmental protection equipment, technical services and equipment leasing of related products, related components, as well as information consultation, industry investment and management services; asset management; and import and export services. The company was formerly known as CSR Corporation Limited and changed its name to CRRC Corporation Limited in June 2015. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

603032.SS.summary: Delixi Xinjiang Transportation Co.,Ltd. engages in the road passenger transportation business in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company operates through Road Passenger Transport Business, Passenger Bus Station Business, and Other Business segments. It provides passenger bus station services. The company is also involved in housing and warehouse leasing, vehicle maintenance and repair, vehicle parts sale, and road freight business. It operates 109 domestic passenger lines, 11 international passenger lines, 383 class line passenger vehicles, and 3 passenger bus stations. The company was formerly known as Delixi Xinjiang Passenger Transportation Group Ltd. Delixi Xinjiang Transportation Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in ÃrÃ¼mqi, the People's Republic of China. Delixi Xinjiang Transportation Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Delixi Holding Group Co., Ltd.

603069.SS.summary: Hainan Haiqi Transportation Group Co.,Ltd. operates as a road transportation company in China. It offers passenger transport, logistics express delivery, taxi and tourist passenger transportation, car maintenance, and other services. The company was formerly known as Hainan Haiqi Transportation Group Limited. The company was founded in 1951 and is based in Haikou, China.

603111.SS.summary: Nanjing Kangni Mechanical & Electrical Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, manufacture, sale, and maintenance of railway vehicle door systems. The company offers mass transit vehicle doors, including electrically driven bi-parting and single-leaf sliding plug, electrically driven bi-parting external tightness and pocket sliding, manual sliding plug, manual pocket sliding, hinged, and external emergency front doors, as well as upturned hinged emergency front door/emergency stairs and rear end doors for cabs. It also provides main line vehicle doors, such as electrically controlled pneumatically driven pocket sliding and sliding plug, electrically controlled electrically driven sliding plug and sliding, manually operated sliding plug, manual operated hinged/sliding, inflatable sealing sliding plug, and manual sliding door/manually operated hinged door/manually operated swing doors. In addition, the company offers platform screen doors comprising full and half-height platform screen door systems for railway stations; and vehicle interior fittings that include partition of VIP rooms, central ceilings/ventilation grids, longitudinal transoms, partition walls/electrical cubicle covers of cab, side walls/side ceilings, side windows, and handrails and screens, as well as bus doors. Further, it provides power connectors and new energy products for automobile industry and precision machining equipment; and electrical, mechanism driving, door leaf, and operating parts, as well as after sales and maintenance services. The company has operations in China, France, Canada, Turkey, Singapore, Argentina, the United States, Saudi Arabia, Brazil, the United Kingdom, Germany, Austria, Italy, and Russia under the Kangni brand. Nanjing Kangni Mechanical & Electrical Co.,Ltd was founded in 2000 and is based in Nanjing, China.

603500.SS.summary: Zhejiang Tiantai Xianghe Industrial Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of rail fasteners in China and internationally. It offers rubber seal plugs for aluminum electrolytic capacitors; electronic v-chip bases; UP3 bases; and non-metal orbital fasteners that connects the steel rail and the sleeper on the rail. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Tiantai, China.

605001.SS.summary: Qingdao Victall Railway Co., Ltd. provides modular products and components for high-speed trains, and urban rail and metro vehicles in China and internationally. Its principal products include rail vehicle passenger and driver interior, subway interior, sanitary water supply, door, air duct, kitchen, front end opening and closing mechanism, through-channel, and lighting systems; and rail vehicle exterior parts, fronts, luggage racks, subway folding seats, cab curtains, driver's cab back walls and doors, VIP side cabinets, 3D molded structural parts, BC parts, etc. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Qingdao, China.

688009.SS.long_name: China Railway Signal & Communication Corporation Limited
688009.SS.summary: China Railway Signal & Communication Corporation Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides rail transportation control system solutions in China and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Rail Transportation Control System, General Construction Contracting, and Others. It offers design, consultancy, and system integration services for rail transportation control system projects; and integrated rail transportation solutions. The company also produces and sells signal system products, communication information system products, infrastructure equipment and information systems, and other related products. In addition, it offers construction, installation, testing, operation, and maintenance services for rail transportation control systems; and services relating to municipal engineering projects and other construction projects. Further, the company engages in the investment management, technical exchange and trade, and bidding agency activities, as well as provision of project management activities. The company was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Beijing, China. China Railway Signal & Communication Corporation Limited is a subsidiary of China Railway Signal & Communication (Group) Corporation Limited.

688033.SS.summary: Beijing Tianyishangjia New Material Corp., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, and markets brake pads and brake block series products for high-speed trains, EMU, rolling stock, urban rail transit vehicles. Its products include sintered brake pads, sintered brake shoes, organic brake pads, organic brake shoes, brake blocks, and other products. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Beijing, China.

688569.SS.long_name: Beijing Tieke Shougang Rail Way-Tech Co., Ltd.
688569.SS.summary: Beijing Tieke Shougang Rail Way-Tech Co., Ltd. manufactures railroad rolling stock products. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Beijing, China.

C2L.F.summary: CRRC Corporation Limited and its subsidiaries research, design, develop, manufacture, sell, refurbish, service, and lease locomotives and rolling stock in Mainland China and internationally. The company provides rolling stock, which includes electric and diesel locomotives, trains, EMU, DMU, metro cars, LRVs, coaches, wagons, and track machinery; components, such as motors, electric control equipment, locomotive components, vehicle components, and casting and forging; and other products, consisting trucks, buses, construction machineries, turnouts, wind turbines, and intelligent machines. It also offers engineering machinery, mechanical equipment, electronic appliances, environmental protection equipment, technical services and equipment leasing of related products, related components, as well as information consultation, industry investment and management services; asset management; and import and export services. The company was formerly known as CSR Corporation Limited and changed its name to CRRC Corporation Limited in June 2015. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

The company operates through three segments: Rail Transportation Control System, General Construction Contracting, and Others. It offers design, consultancy, and system integration services for rail transportation control system projects; and integrated rail transportation solutions. The company also produces and sells signal system products, communication information system products, infrastructure equipment and information systems, and other related products. Its passenger transportation services include the operation of Guangzhou-Shenzhen inter-city express trains, long-distance trains, and Guangzhou-Hong Kong city through trains. The company's freight transportation services comprise the transportation of full load and single load cargos, containers, bulky and heavy cargo, dangerous goods, perishable goods, and oversized cargo. It also provides railway network usage services; and other transportation-related services, such as railway operation, locomotive and passenger car leasing, passenger service, and luggage transportation services, as well as sells food, beverages, and merchandise on board the trains and in railway stations. In addition, the company is involved in train repair, on-board catering, materials and supplies sale, goods sale, cargo loading and unloading, and other businesses related to railway transportation. Further, it offers warehousing, hotel management, and real estate construction services. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

Further, the company engages in the investment management, technical exchange and trade, and bidding agency activities, as well as provision of project management activities. The company was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Beijing, China. China Railway Signal & Communication Corporation Limited is a subsidiary of China Railway Signal & Communication (Group) Corporation Limited.

ZHUZF.long_name: Zhuzhou CRRC Times Electric Co., Ltd.
ZHUZF.summary: Zhuzhou CRRC Times Electric Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, in the research, development, designs, manufactures, and sells railway transportation equipment products, and provision of relevant services primarily in Mainland China and internationally. The company also produces propulsion and control systems for trains and electric vehicles, signaling systems, power supply solutions, platform screen doors, rail maintenance vehicles, marine engineering equipment, and component products for various applications. Its products for rolling stock and railways include EMU, locomotive, and mass transit systems; and components products consist of semiconductors, resistors, reactors, radiators, sensors, power capacitors, and heatsinks. The company's energy and industrial products comprise marine engineering, electric vehicle, and inverter and converter systems, as well as provides railway maintenance and construction machines. The company was formerly known as Zhuzhou CSR Times Electric Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhuzhou CRRC Times Electric Co., Ltd. in March 2016. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Wanchai, Hong Kong.
